price: 16. Yalli ama kitaabal (Qhuraan kinnuk) kay leedaa kee kay kacni edde yanim kataata mara Saayaay nagayna edde tan gital tirri ken haa, Yalli koroosanni diteetak iimaan diifu fanah ken edde yayyaaqe kay idniiy kay fayxih, massa-le gitâ (islaam diini kinnuk) fanah tirri ken haa.
arabic: يَهۡدِي بِهِ ٱللَّهُ مَنِ ٱتَّبَعَ رِضۡوَٰنَهُۥ سُبُلَ ٱلسَّلَٰمِ وَيُخۡرِجُهُم مِّنَ ٱلظُّلُمَٰتِ إِلَى ٱلنُّورِ بِإِذۡنِهِۦ وَيَهۡدِيهِمۡ إِلَىٰ صِرَٰطٖ مُّسۡتَقِيمٖ

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: yahdī bihi al-lahu mani ittabaʿa riḍ'wānahu subula al-salāmi wayukh'rijuhum mina al-ẓulumāti ilā al-nūri bi-idh'nihi wayahdīhim ilā ṣirāṭin mus'taqīmin
